ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Digest Number 214
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow! That s pretty much how Mystic Alliance turned out to me.  Lotsa nice folks, some not nice, but I outgrew the guild and had to go join a guild where I
ygData.messageBody:
Wow!
That's pretty much how Mystic Alliance turned out to me. Lotsa nice folks,
some not nice, but I outgrew the guild and had to go join a guild where I
could actually do stuff.


----- Original Message -----
From: "montaillou" <montaillou@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2001 12:43 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_rainbow] Digest Number 214


> Yeah, Kirei is a monk, a serious twink - I got to 45 in 18 days and
quickly out-paced the rest of the guild. My main is a 57 magician, Beltath,
in Destiny, now they're both in Destiny.
>
> I mostly ignored the guildchat, and only ever fought along side a couple
people in Amazons. I occasionally put forth the voice of cohesion as well.
But, really, the guild was just too low to be of any use to me.
>
> Of course, I would hardly call Destiny much improvement...
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Melanie Mayfield [SMTP:Mpatient1@...]
> Sent: Sunday, March 04, 2001 9:01 AM
> To: EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Digest Number 214
>
>
> Hey! I was/am in that Guild!! and Kirei sounds familiar...Monk? I signed
on
> there once about oh 3 months ago & was told about a split, and for that
> moment I talked'em out of it (since the leader of the split said 90% of
the
> toons we're leaving I pointed out it might be easier just to fix the
> amazons, besides! what better tag is ther than Amazons of Norrath! hehee
> sorry guys)
> it was still together a few weeks ago...oh, and all female toons, not
> players, lots of straight guys who want to make cracks about butt
cleavage,
> again, back when I was an active member...
>
> Melanie-
>
> Ompa <Mystic Alliance>
> Rhunz <Amazons of Norrath>
>
>
> Message: 3 Date: Sat, 3 Mar 2001 22:30:30 -0800
> From: montaillou <montaillou@...>Subject: RE: GLBT Guilds
> There is a female-only guild on Sol Ro called Amazons of Norrath, and
about
> the
> time I left them a splinter group was imminent. However, it wasn't a
> lesbian
> guild, and only a few members (myself among them) were adamant about
keeping
> the
> guild female only.
> Reason I left? When I left, I was 45th, average lvl was about 23, closest
> to me
> was 40th. I left and joined an uber guild.-Kirei Tokage, Sol Ro
